attributes.action: Stop the illegal immigrants entering the UK on boats at dover
attributes.additional_details: We live on an island that is far to small for the amount of illegals coming in. Stop the benefits and hand outs immediately and send the ones already here to Rwanda as they promised
attributes.background: Stop the boats in the middle of the channel and turn them around back to france

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621744

We can accept petitions calling for changes to arrangements for people seeking asylum, but it would need to be clear what changes you wanted to be made to these arrangements.
